Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vSALESPERSONREGIONMAPPING' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vSALESPERSONREGIONMAPPING] GO CREATE VIEW vSALESPERSONREGIONMAPPING AS SELECT t.CompanyID, t.WorkGroupID, t.Description, t.ParentWGID, m.UserID, m.Active, e.BAccountID, e.SalespersonID, s.SalespersonCD FROM EPCompanyTree t INNER JOIN EPCompanyTreeMember m ON t.CompanyID = m.CompanyID AND t.WorkGroupID = m.WorkGroupID AND m.Active = 1 INNER JOIN EPEmployee e ON m.CompanyID = e.CompanyID AND m.UserID = e.UserID INNER JOIN SalesPerson s on e.CompanyID = s.CompanyID AND e.SalespersonID = s.SalespersonID WHERE t.ParentWGID = (SELECT TOP 1 x.WorkGroupID FROM EPCompanyTree x WHERE t.CompanyID = x.CompanyID and x.Description like '%(CRM)%')
